original: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / de ljang bu de'i 'dab ma la spyod pa dang / me tog la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / de ljang bu de'i 'dab ma la spyod pa dang / me tog la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste /
translated: the leaves are perfect, the flowers are perfect, and the fruits are perfect, and they enjoy the leaves, enjoy the flowers, and enjoy the fruits, in the same way, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for the sake of beings,

original: de dag rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de /
analyzed: de dag rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de /
translated: and they gradually practice the six perfections and reach the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de dag lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar @207a *//
analyzed: de dag lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar @207a *//
translated: They become a support for all beings, like leaves, flowers, and fruits.

original: 'gyur ro // rab 'byor /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // rab 'byor /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: de la lo ma ni /
analyzed: de la lo ma ni /
translated: what are the leaves?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'grol ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'grol ba'o //
translated: It is on the basis of the bodhisattva great beings that beings are completely freed from the three lower realms.

original: me tog ni /
analyzed: me tog ni /
translated: Flowers are

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing rgyal rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing rgyal rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /
translated: on the basis of the bodhisattva great beings that they are born into a great and high caste, that they are born into a great and high brahmin caste, that they are born into a great and high householder caste, that they are born as a god in the Heaven of the Four Great Kings,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba dang / mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba dang / dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba dang / 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba dang / tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba dang / mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba dang / dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba dang / 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba dang / tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /
translated: that they are born as a god in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, that they are born as a god in Yāma Heaven, that they are born as a god in Tuṣita Heaven, that they are born as a god in Nirmāṇarati Heaven, that they are born as a god in Paranirmitavaśavartin Heaven, and that they are born as a god in Brahmākāyika Heaven.

original: tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba dang / tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba dang / snang ba'i lhar skye ba dang / chung snang gi lhar skye ba dang / tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba dang /🔽kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba dang / dge ba'i lhar skye ba dang / chung dge'i lhar skye ba dang / tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye ba dang / dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba dang / che ba'i lhar skye ba dang / chung che'i lhar skye ba dang /
analyzed: tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba dang / tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba dang / snang ba'i lhar skye ba dang / chung snang gi lhar skye ba dang / tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba dang / kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba dang / dge ba'i lhar skye ba dang / chung dge'i lhar skye ba dang / tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye ba dang / dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba dang / che ba'i lhar skye ba dang / chung che'i lhar skye ba dang /
translated: birth as a Brahma-world god of Lesser Purity, birth as a Brahma-world god of Great Purity, birth as a Brahma-world god of Limited Radiance, birth as a Brahma-world god of Immeasurable Radiance,🔽birth as a Brahma-world god of Radiant Splendor, birth as a Brahma-world god of Lesser Virtue, birth as a Brahma-world god of Immeasurable Virtue,

original: tshad med che ba'i lhar skye ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba dang / mi che ba'i lhar skye ba dang / mi gdung pa'i lhar skye ba dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba dang / gya nom snang ba'i @207b lhar skye ba dang /
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lhar skye ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba dang / mi che ba'i lhar skye ba dang / mi gdung pa'i lhar skye ba dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba dang / gya nom snang ba'i @207b lhar skye ba dang /
translated: birth as a Brahma-world god of Vast Virtue, birth as a Brahma-world god of Lesser Excellence, birth as a Brahma-world god of Immeasurable Excellence,🔽birth as a Brahma-world god of Excellent Greatness, birth as a Brahma-world god of Lesser No-thought,🔽birth as a Brahma-world god of Immeasurable No-thought, birth as a Brahma-world god of No-thought, birth as a Brahma-world god of Lesser Good Vision, birth as a Brahma-world god of Excellent Vision,

original: 'og min gyi lhar skye ba dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'o //
analyzed: 'og min gyi lhar skye ba dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'o //
translated: rebirth as a god in the Unsurpassed Heaven, rebirth as a god in the Sphere of Infinite Space, rebirth as a god in the Sphere of Infinite Consciousness, rebirth as a god in the Sphere of Nothingness, and rebirth as a god in the Sphere of Neither Perception nor Non-perception.

original: 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni /
translated: The result is as follows.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang /
translated: Having attained the knowledge of all aspects, the bodhisattva mahāsattva establishes those beings in the result of stream enterer, establishes them in the result of once-returner, establishes them in the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid la brten cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas de dag kyang sems can thams cad 'bras bu la nye bar 'tsho ba bzhin nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid la brten cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas de dag kyang sems can thams cad 'bras bu la nye bar 'tsho ba bzhin nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and they establish them in the fruit of a stream-enterer, in the fruit of a once-returner, in the fruit of a non-returner, in the fruit of an arhat, in individual enlightenment, and in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de la gang gis yon phul ba de dag kyang rim gyis 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la gang gis yon phul ba de dag kyang rim gyis 'di lta ste /
translated: Those who have given gifts to them will gradually,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
translated: through the Śrāvaka Vehicle,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
translated: the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle,

original: theg pa chen po'am /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'am /
translated: or the Great Vehicle,

original: theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur yang de la sems can du'ang mi 'dogs /
analyzed: theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur yang de la sems can du'ang mi 'dogs /
translated: attain final nirvāṇa and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems can du gdags pa'ang @208a *//
analyzed: sems can du gdags pa'ang @208a *//
translated: and there is no designation of a sentient being,

original: med par sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas zhes bya ba'i sems can nam /
analyzed: med par sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ste / rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas zhes bya ba'i sems can nam /
translated: and they are liberated from apprehending a sentient being.

original: sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that do not apprehend a sentient being or a designation of a sentient being, thinking, ‘For the sake of that one I will attain the knowledge of all aspects.’🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that do not apprehend a sentient being or a designation of a sentient being, thinking, ‘For the sake of that one I will attain the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti then said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings should be known as tathāgatas.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is because all the hells are stopped on the basis of bodhisattva great beings.

original: byol song gi skye gnas thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the animal realms are stopped.

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //🔽mi khom pa dang ngan song thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro // mi khom pa dang ngan song thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all the worlds of the Lord of Death will be cut off;🔽all the unfortunate realms will be cut off;

original: dbul po thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbul po thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all poverty will be cut off;

original: shul gyi rgyud dma' ba thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shul gyi rgyud dma' ba thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all the low-lying regions will be cut off;

original: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all the desire realms will be cut off;

original: gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all the form realms will be cut off;

original: gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: and all the formless realms will be cut off.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin @208b no; ;de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin @208b no; ;de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being should be known as a tathāgata.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med pa na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med pa na /
translated: Subhūti, if there were no bodhisattva great beings,

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur; rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur; rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
translated: and the Pratyekabuddhas would not appear in the world.

original: dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
translated: The Arhats, the Non-returners, the Once-returners, and the Streamwinners would not appear in the world.

original: sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: All the hells would not cease,

original: byol song gi skye gnas thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: all animal births would not cease,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: all the worlds of Yama would not cease,

original: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: all the world of desire would not cease,

original: gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: all the world of form would not cease,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the formless realm would not be interrupted.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti,

original: gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know that a bodhisattva great being is a tathāgata.

original: zhes zer ba ni /🔽rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes zer ba ni / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: ”🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /🔽rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs @209a *//
analyzed: de de bzhin te / rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs @209a *//
translated: Subhūti, it is so!

original: pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, one should know that a bodhisattva great being is a tathāgata.🔽”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: “Why is that, Subhūti?

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa thams cad gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa thams cad gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, the suchness by which a tathāgata is designated, the suchness by which a pratyekabuddha is designated, the suchness by which all noble beings are designated, the suchness by which form is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'du shes su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'du byed du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mig tu gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'du shes su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'du byed du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mig tu gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which feeling is imputed, the suchness on account of which perception is imputed, the suchness on account of which formation is imputed, the suchness on account of which consciousness is imputed, the suchness on account of which the eyes are imputed,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis rna bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis snar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lcer gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lus su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis yid du gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis rna bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis snar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lcer gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lus su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis yid du gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the ears are imputed, the suchness on account of which the nose is imputed, the suchness on account of which the tongue is imputed, the suchness on account of which the body is imputed, the suchness on account of which the mental faculty is imputed,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sgrar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis drir gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis ror gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis reg tu gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sgrar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis drir gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis ror gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis reg tu gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which form is designated, the suchness on account of which sound is designated, the suchness on account of which smell is designated, the suchness on account of which taste is designated, the suchness on account of which tactility is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis chos su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa @209b dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis chos su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa @209b dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which mental objects are designated, the suchness on account of which eye consciousness is designated, the suchness on account of which ear consciousness is designated, the suchness on account of which nose consciousness is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the tongue consciousness is designated, the suchness on account of which the body consciousness is designated, the suchness on account of which the mind consciousness is designated, the suchness on account of which eye contact is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which ear contact is designated, the suchness on account of which nose contact is designated, the suchness on account of which tongue contact is designated, the suchness on account of which body contact is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /
translated: “The suchness on account of which the ear constituent is designated, the suchness on account of which the sound constituent is designated, and the suchness on account of which the ear consciousness constituent is designated.🔽“The suchness on account of which the nose constituent is designated, the suchness on account of which the smell constituent is designated, and the suchness on account of which the nose consciousness constituent is designated.🔽“The suchness on account of which the tongue constituent is designated, the suchness on account of which the taste constituent is designated, and the suchness on account of which the tongue consciousness constituent is designated.

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang /
translated: “The suchness on account of which the body constituent is designated, the suchness on account of which the tangible object constituent is designated, and the suchness on account of which the body consciousness constituent is designated.🔽“The suchness on account of which the mental constituent is designated, the suchness on account of which the phenomenon constituent is designated, and the suchness on account of which the mind consciousness constituent is designated.🔽“The suchness on account of which the earth element is designated, the suchness on account of which the water element is designated, and the suchness on account of which the fire element is designated.

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sa'i khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis chu'i @210a *//
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sa'i khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis chu'i @210a *//
translated: “The suchness on account of which the wind element is designated, the suchness on account of which the space element is designated, and the suchness on account of which the consciousness element is designated.🔽“The suchness on account of which the eye sense field is designated, the suchness on account of which the form sense field is designated, and the suchness on account of which the eye consciousness sense field is designated.🔽“The suchness on account of which the ear sense field is designated, the suchness on account of which the sound sense field is designated, and the suchness on account of which the ear consciousness sense field is designated.🔽“The suchness on account of which the nose sense field is designated, the suchness on account of which the smell sense field is designated, and the suchness on account of which the nose consciousness sense field is designated.🔽“

original: khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis me'i khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rlung gi khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis nam mkha'i khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa dang /
analyzed: khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis me'i khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rlung gi khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis nam mkha'i khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the earth element is designated, the suchness on account of which the water element is designated, the suchness on account of which the fire element is designated, the suchness on account of which the wind element is designated, the suchness on account of which the space element is designated, and the suchness on account of which the consciousness element is designated.

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis ma rig par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'du byed du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis ming dang gzugs su gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis ma rig par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'du byed du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis ming dang gzugs su gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which ignorance is designated, the suchness on account of which conditioning factors are designated, the suchness on account of which consciousness is designated, the suchness on account of which name and form are designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched drug tu gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sred par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis len par gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched drug tu gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis reg par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sred par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis len par gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the six sense fields are labeled, the suchness on account of which contact is labeled, the suchness on account of which feeling is labeled, the suchness on account of which craving is labeled, the suchness on account of which grasping is labeled,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis srid par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis skye bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rga shir gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis srid par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis skye bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rga shir gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which becoming is labeled, the suchness on account of which birth is labeled, the suchness on account of which aging and death are labeled, the suchness on account of which the perfection of generosity is labeled,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par @210b gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par @210b gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the perfection of ethical discipline is labeled, the suchness on account of which the perfection of patience is labeled, the suchness on account of which the perfection of perseverance is labeled,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the transcendent perfection of meditative stability is designated, the suchness on account of which the transcendent perfection of wisdom is designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of internal phenomena is designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of external phenomena is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of emptiness is designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of great extent is designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of ultimate reality is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which conditioned emptiness is nominally designated, the suchness on account of which unconditioned emptiness is nominally designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of what transcends limits is nominally designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is nominally designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is nominally designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of nature is nominally designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of all things is nominally designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of defining attributes is nominally designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa @211a *//
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa @211a *//
translated: the suchness on account of which the emptiness of non-entities is designated,

original: dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su gdags dang /
analyzed: dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su gdags dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the emptiness of essential nature is designated, the suchness on account of which the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities is designated, the suchness on account of which the applications of mindfulness are designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis yang dag par spong ba rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dbang po rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis stobs rnams su gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis yang dag par spong ba rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dbang po rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis stobs rnams su gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the right efforts are designated, the suchness on account of which the legs of miraculous power are designated, the suchness on account of which the faculties are designated, the suchness on account of which the powers are designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis bsam gtan rnams su gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis bsam gtan rnams su gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the branches of enlightenment are designated, the suchness on account of which the noble eightfold path is designated, the suchness on account of which the noble truths are designated, the suchness on account of which the meditative concentrations are designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis tshad med pa rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par thar pa brgyad du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis tshad med pa rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam par thar pa brgyad du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the immeasurable aspirations are designated, the suchness on account of which the formless absorptions are designated, the suchness on account of which the eight aspects of liberation are designated, the suchness on account of which the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis byams pa chen por gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis snying rje chen por gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis byams pa chen por gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis snying rje chen por gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which great love is designated, the suchness on account of which great compassion is designated, the suchness on account of which the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are designated, the suchness on account of which the result of stream enterer is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang byang chub tu gdags pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang byang chub tu gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness on account of which the result of once-returner is designated, the suchness on account of which the result of non-returner is designated, the suchness on account of which the state of a worthy one is designated, the suchness on account of which individual enlightenment is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas kyi khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa de dag @212a *//
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas kyi khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa de dag @212a *//
translated: and the suchness on account of which the uncompounded element is designated,

original: thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te /
translated: all of them are just that.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
translated: it is called suchness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings

original: de bzhin nyid de la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas /
translated: train in that suchness and attain the knowledge of all aspects,

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste /
translated: so they are called tathāgatas.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
translated: Subhūti, by way of this one of many explanations

original: de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te /
translated: you should understand that

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: bodhisattva great beings

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: are tathāgatas themselves, taking suchness as the measure.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste /
translated: Subhuti, this is how the Bodhisattva, the great being, should train in the perfection of wisdom of suchness.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being,

original: de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la slob bo //
translated: trains in the perfection of wisdom of suchness and trains in the suchness of all dharmas.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslab cing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslab cing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Having trained in the suchness of all dharmas, he perfects the suchness of all dharmas.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byed do //
translated: Having perfected the suchness of all dharmas, he attains mastery over the suchness of all dharmas.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byas shing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byas shing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do //
translated: Having attained mastery over the suchness of all dharmas, he becomes skilled in the faculties of all beings.

original: dbang po la mkhas par byas shing dbang po yongs su bsgong ba la mkhas pa thob par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po la mkhas par byas shing dbang po yongs su bsgong ba la mkhas pa thob par byed do //
translated: Having become skilled in the faculties, he attains skill in the development of the faculties.

original: dbang po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa thob @212b par byas shing sems can rnams kyi las rang gis byas pa shes par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa thob @212b par byas shing sems can rnams kyi las rang gis byas pa shes par byed do //
translated: Having attained skill in the development of the faculties, he causes sentient beings to understand their own actions.

original: sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes bar byas shing smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes bar byas shing smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Having caused sentient beings to understand their own actions, he brings about the completion of the wisdom of aspiration.

original: smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do //
analyzed: smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do //
translated: Having brought about the completion of the wisdom of aspiration, he purifies wisdom in the three times.

original: dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
analyzed: dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
translated: Having purified wisdom in the three times, he benefits sentient beings by engaging in the conduct of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: While benefiting sentient beings, he purifies the buddha realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: having purified a buddhafield and attained the knowledge of all modes,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: having attained the knowledge of all modes, he sets rolling the wheel of the Dharma,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do //
translated: having set rolling the wheel of the Dharma, he establishes beings in the three vehicles,

original: sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod nas phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod nas phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
translated: having established beings in the three vehicles, he passes on into the realm of Nirvana which leaves nothing behind.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang legs pa thams cad mthong nas bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang legs pa thams cad mthong nas bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Thus, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, having seen all the virtues and benefits, should himself raise his thought to the supreme enlightenment,

original: gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and he should also induce others to set their thought out for the supreme enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @213a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @213a *//
translated: those bodhisattva great beings

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni /
translated: who practice this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o //
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o //
translated: are worthy of homage from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings who practice this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o //
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o //
translated: are worthy of homage from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu
translated: “Blessed One, how much merit will a bodhisattva great being who has given rise to the first level of bodhichitta and who wishes to fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood for the benefit of all sentient beings generate?

original: 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: Blessed One, how much will their merit increase?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur /
translated: “Subhūti, if all the sentient beings in a great trichiliocosm were to abide in the level of the hearers

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na /
translated: and the level of the solitary buddhas,

original: sems can de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lam /
translated: would their merit increase a lot?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: it would increase a lot.

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: tshad ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshad ma mchis so //
translated: it would be immeasurable.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Blessed One,

original: tshad @213b ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshad @213b ma mchis so //
translated: it would be immeasurable.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: rab 'byor / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, the merit of all the sentient beings of the great billionfold world system who have become followers of the vehicle of the hearers

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur ba'i bsod nams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams las /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur ba'i bsod nams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams las /
translated: or the vehicle of the solitary buddhas, and the merit of a bodhisattva great being who has given rise to the first level of arousal of the mind of awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs de la ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs de la ni /
translated: compared to the accumulation of merit of a bodhisattva who has given rise to the first level of arousal of the mind of awakening,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
translated: the merit of all the sentient beings of the great billionfold world system who have become followers of the vehicle of the hearers

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams des brgya'i chir yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams des brgya'i chir yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: or the vehicle of the solitary buddhas does not even come close to a hundredth of it.🔽It does not even come close to a thousandth of it.

original: brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It does not even come close to a hundred-thousandth of it.

original: bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: it does not approach even a hundred-thousandth part of a koṭi of a calculation,🔽it does not approach even a hundred-thousand-hundred-thousandth part of a calculation,

original: bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: it does not approach even a hundred-thousand-hundred-thousand-hundred-thousandth part of a calculation,🔽it does not approach even a hundred-thousand-hundred-thousand-hundred-thousand-hundred-thousandth part of a calculation,

original: bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: it does not approach even a hundred-thousand-hundred-thousand-hundred-thousand-hundred-thousand-hundred-thousandth part of a calculation,

original: grangs su'ang mi bzod /🔽char yang mi bzod /
analyzed: grangs su'ang mi bzod / char yang mi bzod /

original: bgrang bar yang mi bzod /🔽dper yang mi bzod /
analyzed: bgrang bar yang mi bzod / dper yang mi bzod /
translated: it cannot be endured in a count,🔽it cannot be endured in an example,

original: rgyur yang mi bzod do //
analyzed: rgyur yang mi bzod do //
translated: it cannot be endured in a cause.🔽Why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni /

original: gang zag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams te /
analyzed: gang zag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams te /
translated: are the persons of the vehicle of the hearers and the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni /🔽byang chub sems @214a *//
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni / byang chub sems @214a *//

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no //
translated: are not the bodhisattva great beings.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am; rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa lta zhog gi /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am; rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa lta zhog gi /
translated: Let alone all the sentient beings of the great trichiliocosm who have entered the vehicle of the hearers or the vehicle of the solitary buddhas,🔽if all the sentient beings of the great trichiliocosm were to possess the qualities of the hearers and solitary buddhas, the merit of those would

original: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi
analyzed: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi
translated: not approach even a hundredth part of the merit of a bodhisattva who has generated the first thought of awakening.

analyzed: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It would not approach even a thousandth part.🔽It would not approach even a hundred thousandth part.

analyzed: bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It would not approach even a ten millionth part.🔽It would not approach even a thousand millionth part.

original: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //

analyzed: bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: it does not approach even a hundredth part of it,🔽it does not approach even a thousandth part of it,🔽it does not approach even a hundred thousandth part of it,🔽it does not approach even a millionth part of it,

analyzed: grangs su'ang mi bzod / char yang mi bzod / bgrang bar yang mi bzod / dper yang mi bzod /

original: rgyur yang mi bzod do //

analyzed: dper yang mi bzod /

translated: It cannot bear counting.🔽It cannot bear enumeration.🔽It cannot bear being reckoned.

original: rgyur yang mi bzod do //
analyzed: rgyur yang mi bzod do //
translated: It cannot bear being added up.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams te /
translated: Pratyekabuddhas come from bodhisattvas,

original: rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no //
translated: but bodhisattva great beings do not come from pratyekabuddhas.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi /
translated: Leave aside all the sentient beings in the worlds in the great billionfold world system who have become pratyekabuddhas.

original: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang🔽nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: If all the sentient beings of the great trichiliocosm were to enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas, the merit of those would not approach even a hundredth part of the merit of the bodhisattva who has entered into enlightenment.🔽It would not approach even a thousandth part.

original: brgya phrag stong gi char yang @218a *//🔽nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: brgya phrag stong gi char yang @218a *// nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It would not approach even a hundred thousandth part.🔽It would not approach even a ten millionth part.🔽It would not approach even a thousand millionth part.

original: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It would not approach even a hundred thousand millionth part.🔽It would not approach even a ten trillionth part.🔽It would not approach even a hundred trillionth part.

original: bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It would not approach even a thousand trillionth part.

original: grangs su'ang mi bzod //🔽char yang mi bzod /
analyzed: grangs su'ang mi bzod // char yang mi bzod /
translated: It would not even bear counting.🔽It would not even bear comparison.

original: bgrang bar yang mi bzod /
analyzed: bgrang bar yang mi bzod /
translated: It would not even bear enumeration.

original: dper yang mi bzod /
analyzed: dper yang mi bzod /
translated: It cannot bear comparison.

original: rgyur yang mi bzod do //
analyzed: rgyur yang mi bzod do //
translated: It cannot bear comparison as a cause.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par gyur pa lta zhog gi /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par gyur pa lta zhog gi /

original: skye ba med pa /
analyzed: skye ba med pa /
translated: it is not produced;

original: 'byung ba med pa ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba med pa ste /

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni /

analyzed: dmigs pa med pa ste /
translated: is not an object.

analyzed: dran pas dbang sgyur ba /

original: zhi ba'i rnam pa mtshan nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: zhi ba'i rnam pa mtshan nyid med pa yin te /

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa'o //
translated: is the object of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ni / dbang sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dbang sgyur ba'o //

original: 'di ni / rnam pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rnam pa'o //
translated: This is the aspect.

original: 'di ni / mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni / mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the defining mark.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti then asked, “Blessed One,

original: ci lags / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'ba' zhig dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam /
analyzed: ci lags / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'ba' zhig dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam /
translated: is it only the knowledge of all aspects that is not a thing?

original: ma lags kyi /
analyzed: ma lags kyi /
translated: “No, it is not.”🔽🔽

original: gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: form is also not a thing.

original: tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Feelings are also non-entities.

original: 'du shes kyang dngos po ma @219a *//🔽mchis pa lags /
analyzed: 'du shes kyang dngos po ma @219a *// mchis pa lags /
translated: Perceptions are also non-entities.

original: 'du byed kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Formations are also non-entities.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Consciousness is also a non-entity.

original: mig kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽rna ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽sna'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: mig kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / rna ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / sna'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The eyes are also non-entities.🔽The ears are also non-entities.🔽The nose is also a non-entity.

original: lce'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: lce'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The tongue is also a non-entity.

original: lus kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: lus kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The body is also a non-entity.

original: yid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: yid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The mind is also a non-entity.

original: gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Form is also a non-entity.

original: sgra'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽dri'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽ro'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: sgra'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / dri'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / ro'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Sound is also a non-entity.🔽Smell is also a non-entity.🔽Taste is also a non-entity.

original: reg kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: reg kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Touch is also a non-entity.

original: chos kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: chos kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Phenomena are also non-entities.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Eye consciousness is also a non-entity.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The consciousness of the ears is also a non-entity.🔽The consciousness of the nose is also a non-entity.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The consciousness of the tongue is also a non-entity.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The consciousness of the body is also a non-entity.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The consciousness of the mind is also a non-entity.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The coming together of the eye is also a non-entity.🔽The coming together of the ear is also a non-entity.🔽The coming together of the nose is also a non-entity.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The coming together of the tongue is also a non-entity.

original: @219b lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: @219b lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The coming together of the body is also a non-entity.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The coming together of the mind is also a non-entity.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The feeling that arises from the coming together of the eye is also a non-entity.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear is also non-entity.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose is also non-entity.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue is also non-entity.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /

original: sa'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The earth element is also non-entity.

original: chu'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /

analyzed: me'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / rlung gi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The perfection of generosity is not a real thing,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the perfection of conduct is not a real thing,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the perfection of patience is not a real thing,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The perfection of perseverance is also non-entity.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The perfection of concentration is also non-entity.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also non-entity.🔽Inner emptiness is also non-entity.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Outer emptiness is also non-entity.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is also non-entity.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is also non-entity.🔽Great emptiness is also non-entity.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is also non-entity.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is also non-entity.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is also non-entity.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang @220b dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang @220b dngos po ma mchis pa lags / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is also not a thing.🔽The emptiness of what is without beginning or end is also not a thing.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is also not a thing.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of nature is also not a thing.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is also not a thing.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is also not a thing.🔽The emptiness of nonobservation is also not a thing.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of nonthings is also not a thing.🔽The emptiness of essence is also not a thing.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The emptiness of the essence of nonthings is also not a thing.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are non-existent,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the right efforts are non-existent,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽dbang po rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / dbang po rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the legs of miraculous power are non-existent,🔽the faculties are non-existent,

original: stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the powers are non-existent,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the limbs of awakening are non-existent,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the noble eightfold path is non-existent,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the noble truths are non-existent,

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽tshad med pa rnams @221a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / tshad med pa rnams @221a *//
translated: the meditative stabilities are non-existent,

original: kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the immeasurables are non-existent,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: and the formless absorptions are non-existent.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the liberations are non-existent,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the concentrations are non-existent,🔽the formless absorptions are non-existent,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation are non-existent,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags; gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags; gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the clairvoyances are non-existent,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
