analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the powers are non-existent,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the fearlessnesses are non-existent,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are non-existent,🔽and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-existent.”

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags; byams pa chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags; byams pa chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are also non-entities.

original: snying rje chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /🔽dga' ba chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags / dga' ba chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Great love is also a non-entity.🔽Great compassion is also a non-entity.🔽Great joy is also a non-entity.

original: btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: Great equanimity is also a non-entity.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The compounded element is also a non-entity.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags /
translated: The uncompounded element is also a non-entity.

original: bcom @221b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom @221b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: “Subhūti, the knowledge of all aspects is also a non-entity.

original: gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o // tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Form is also a non-entity.🔽Feeling is also a non-entity.

original: 'du shes kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Perception is also a non-entity.

original: 'du byed kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Formation is also a non-entity.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is also a non-entity.

original: mig kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: mig kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The eyes are also a non-entity.

original: rna ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽sna'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'ang dngos po med pa'o // sna'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the ear is not a thing;🔽the nose is not a thing;

original: lce'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: lce'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the tongue is not a thing;

original: lus kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the body is not a thing;

original: yid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the thinking mind is not a thing;

original: gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: forms are not things;

original: sgra'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽dri'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽ro'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'ang dngos po med pa'o // dri'ang dngos po med pa'o // ro'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: sounds are not things;🔽smells are not things;🔽tastes are not things;

original: reg kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: reg kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: tactile objects are not things;

original: chos kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyang dngos po med pa'o // mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: phenomena are not things;🔽eye consciousness is not a thing;

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: ear consciousness is not a thing;🔽nose consciousness is not a thing;

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: tongue consciousness is not a thing;

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: body consciousness is not a thing;

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: thinking-mind consciousness is not a thing;

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: eye contact is not a thing;

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Ear contact is also non-apprehensible.🔽Nose contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Tongue contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Body contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Mind contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang @222a *//🔽dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang @222a *// dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is also non-apprehensible.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of body contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact is also non-apprehensible.

original: sa'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The earth element is also non-apprehensible.

original: chu'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the water element is also non-apprehensible,

original: me'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the fire element is also non-apprehensible,

original: rlung gi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o; ;nam mkha'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o; ;nam mkha'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the wind element is also non-apprehensible, the space element is also non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: and the consciousness element is also non-apprehensible.

original: ma rig pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is also non-apprehensible,

original: 'du byed kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: volitional factors are also non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: consciousness is also non-apprehensible,

original: ming dang gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: name and form are also non-apprehensible,

original: skye mched drug kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the six sense fields are also non-apprehensible,

original: reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: contact is also non-apprehensible,

original: tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽sred pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o // sred pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: feeling is also non-apprehensible,🔽craving is also non-apprehensible,

original: len pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽srid pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: len pa'ang dngos po med pa'o // srid pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: grasping is also non-apprehensible,🔽becoming is also non-apprehensible,

original: skye ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: birth is also non-apprehensible,

original: rga shi'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: and aging and death are also non-apprehensible.

original: sbyin pa'i  rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i  rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is also non-apprehensible,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the perfection of morality is also non-apprehensible,🔽the perfection of patience is also non-apprehensible,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @222b phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @222b phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the perfection of perseverance is also non-apprehensible,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the perfection of concentration is also non-apprehensible,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o // nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom is also non-apprehensible.🔽Inner emptiness is also non-apprehensible,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: outer emptiness is also non-apprehensible,🔽inner and outer emptiness is also non-apprehensible,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o // chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is also non-apprehensible,🔽great emptiness is also non-apprehensible,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: ultimate emptiness is also non-apprehensible,🔽conditioned emptiness is also non-apprehensible,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: unconditioned emptiness is also non-apprehensible,🔽and the emptiness of intrinsic nature is also non-apprehensible.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is also not an entity.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is also not an entity.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-dispersal is also not an entity.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also not an entity.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o /
translated: The emptiness of all things is also not an entity.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic characteristics is also not an entity.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also not an entity.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-entities is also not an entity.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is also not an entity.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is also not an entity.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are also not entities.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The right efforts are also not entities.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the bases of supernatural powers are non-existent;

original: dbang po rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the faculties are non-existent;

original: stobs rnams kyang dngos po @223a *//
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang dngos po @223a *//
translated: the powers are non-existent;

original: med pa'o // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: med pa'o // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the limbs of awakening are non-existent;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the noble eightfold path is non-existent;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the truths are non-existent;

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the concentrations are non-existent;

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the immeasurables are non-existent;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the formless absorptions are non-existent;

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the liberations are non-existent;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the serial absorptions are non-existent;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are non-existent;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the superknowledges are not a thing;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the meditative stabilizations are not a thing;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are not a thing;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are not a thing;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the fearlessnesses are not a thing;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are not a thing;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o // byams pa chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not a thing;🔽great love is not a thing;

original: snying rje chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽dga' ba chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o // dga' ba chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: great compassion is not a thing;🔽great joy is not a thing;

original: btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o //🔽'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o // 'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: great equanimity is not a thing;🔽the compounded element is not a thing;🔽and the uncompounded element is not a thing.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med @223b pa'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med @223b pa'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is because

original: 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Thus, the knowledge of all aspects is without intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor / gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: Subhūti, that which is without intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: is a non-entity.

original: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags /
translated: “Blessed One, why is the knowledge of all aspects without intrinsic nature?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de; gang la 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de; gang la 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: “Subhūti, the nature of aggregation is without intrinsic nature. That which is without the nature of aggregation

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: is a non-entity.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations,

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: all phenomena

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: are the intrinsic nature of non-entities.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni /
translated: Subhūti, moreover, all phenomena

original: stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: are the intrinsic nature of emptiness.

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: All phenomena

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: are the intrinsic nature of signlessness.

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: All phenomena

original: smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: are the intrinsic nature of wishlessness.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni /
translated: Subhūti, moreover, all phenomena🔽are the intrinsic nature of the absence of arising.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: the reality of suchness,

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: all phenomena

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: are the reality of the perfect endpoint,

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: all phenomena

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: are the reality of the dharma-constituent.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
translated: Subhūti, from this one of many explanations it

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known that all phenomena are the reality of non-entityness.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He continued, “Bhagavān,

original: de ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na /
analyzed: de ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na /
translated: if all phenomena are the reality of non-entityness,

original: 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs @224a *//
analyzed: 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs @224a *//
translated: then, Bhagavān, what method do bodhisattva mahāsattvas who have given rise to the first level of bodhicitta possess in order to practice the perfection of generosity and purify a buddhafield and

original: su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: bring sentient beings to maturity?”

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that, while practicing the perfection of morality, they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?🔽How is it that, while practicing the perfection of patience, they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that, while practicing the perfection of perseverance, they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that, while practicing the perfection of concentration, they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing the perfection of wisdom?

original: bsam gtan dang po la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽bsam gtan gnyis pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / bsam gtan gnyis pa la spyod cing /
translated: How do they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing the first concentration?

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing the second concentration?🔽How do they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing the third concentration?

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa @224b lags; bsam gtan bzhi pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa @224b lags; bsam gtan bzhi pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing the fourth concentration?

original: byams pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽snying rje la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: byams pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / snying rje la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice love and bring about the purification of the buddhafield and the development of living beings?🔽How is it that they practice compassion and bring about the purification of the buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: dga' ba la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: dga' ba la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice joy and bring about the purification of the buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: btang snyoms la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: btang snyoms la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice equanimity and bring about the purification of the buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the sphere of infinite space and bring about the purification of the buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing the sphere of infinite consciousness?

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing the sphere of nothingness?

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception?

original: nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su @225a *//🔽dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su @225a *// dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing inner emptiness?

original: phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing outer emptiness?🔽How is it that they purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity while practicing inner and outer emptiness?

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: Are they practicing the emptiness of the external and internal, purifying a buddhafield, and bringing beings to maturity?

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: Are they practicing the emptiness of emptiness, purifying a buddhafield, and bringing beings to maturity?

original: chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: Are they practicing the emptiness of great extent, purifying a buddhafield, and bringing beings to maturity?🔽Are they practicing the emptiness of ultimate reality, purifying a buddhafield, and bringing beings to maturity?

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: Are they practicing the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, purifying a buddhafield, and bringing beings to maturity?

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: Do they practice the emptiness of the unconditioned and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su @225b dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su @225b dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: Do they practice the emptiness of the beyond and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: Do they practice the emptiness of what is not broken and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: Do they practice the emptiness of inherent existence and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?🔽Do they practice the emptiness of all things and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the spiritual maturation of sentient beings.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: They practice the emptiness of defining attributes and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the spiritual maturation of sentient beings.🔽They practice the emptiness of nonapprehension and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the spiritual maturation of sentient beings.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: They practice the emptiness of nonexistence and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the spiritual maturation of sentient beings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: They practice the emptiness of essential nature and bring about the complete purification of a buddhafield and the spiritual maturation of sentient beings.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: “How do they practice the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / @226a *//🔽sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / @226a *// sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: “How do they practice the four applications of mindfulness and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?🔽“How do they practice the four right efforts and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: “How do they practice the four bases of magical power and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: dbang po lnga la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: dbang po lnga la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: “How do they practice the five spiritual faculties and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: stobs lnga la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: stobs lnga la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they practice the five powers and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they practice the seven parts of enlightenment and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they practice the eightfold noble path and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?🔽How do they practice the four noble truths and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: bsam gtan bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they practice the four meditations and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the development of living beings?

original: tshad med pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems @226b can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems @226b can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the four immeasurables and bring beings to full maturity?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the four formless absorptions and bring beings to full maturity?

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the eight aspects of liberation and bring beings to full maturity?

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the nine serial steps of meditative absorption and bring beings to full maturity?

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the clairvoyances and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the meditative stabilizations and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the dhāraṇī gateways and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that they practice the ten tathāgata powers and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity?

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag @227a *//🔽pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag @227a *// pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they practice the four fearlessnesses and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they practice the four detailed and thorough knowledges and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /🔽byams pa chen po la spyod cing /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags / byams pa chen po la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they practice the eighteen special qualities of the Buddhas and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?🔽How do they practice great love and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?

original: snying rje chen po la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they practice great compassion and bring about the purification of a buddhafield and the maturation of living beings?

original: thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: They practice the knowledge of all aspects and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: They practice the knowledge of paths and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: They practice the knowledge of all aspects and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su 'dris par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing @227b yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su 'dris par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing @227b yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la /
translated: “Subhūti, they practice the knowledge of all aspects and purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / sems can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / sems can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste /
translated: Those buddha-fields and those beings are known to be the intrinsic nature of non-entityness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: That, Subhūti, is the skill in means of bodhisattva great beings.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of giving familiarize with the path to awakening.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: Practicing the perfection of morality they familiarize with the path to awakening.🔽Practicing the perfection of patience they familiarize with the path to awakening.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: Practicing the perfection of perseverance they familiarize with the path to awakening.🔽Practicing the perfection of concentration they familiarize with the path to awakening.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the perfection of concentration and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice inner emptiness and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice outer emptiness and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice inner and outer emptiness and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of emptiness and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su @228a *//🔽'dris par byed do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su @228a *//🔽'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice great emptiness and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of ultimate reality and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of conditioned phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of beyond extremes and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of no beginning and no end and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of no rejection and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of inherent existence and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of defining characteristics and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment. They practice the emptiness of nonobservation and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of other phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of all things and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of nonthings and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of other phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of nonobservation and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of other phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of nonobservation and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /🔽byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of other phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of nonobservation and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of other phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris @228b par byed do //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris @228b par byed do //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the emptiness of all phenomena and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of nonobservation and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the right efforts and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the bases of supernatural powers and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: dbang po rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the faculties and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: stobs rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: stobs rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the powers and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the branches of enlightenment and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the noble eightfold path and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the noble truths and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: bsam gtan rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the concentrations and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: tshad med pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the immeasurables and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the formless absorptions and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the deliverances and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the successive absorptions and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam @229a *//🔽la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam @229a *// la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the clairvoyances and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the meditative stabilities and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the dhāraṇī gateways and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the powers of the tathāgatas and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice fearlessness and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.🔽They practice the correct understandings and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the distinct attributes of the buddhas and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: byams pa chen po la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice great love and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: snying rje chen po la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do; ;thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do; ;thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the knowledge of path aspects and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: They practice the knowledge of all aspects and familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi lam de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @229b du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi lam de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @229b du rab tu shes te /
translated: And they know that path to enlightenment to be the nature of non-entityness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /
translated: Practicing the six perfections, until they have attained the ten powers of the tathāgatas, until they have attained the four fearlessnesses, until they have attained the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / byams pa chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa de'i bar du byang chub kyi lam de la yongs su 'dris par byed do /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / byams pa chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa de'i bar du byang chub kyi lam de la yongs su 'dris par byed do /
translated: until they have attained the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, until they have attained great love, until they have attained great compassion, until they have attained the knowledge of all aspects, they familiarize themselves with the path to enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste /
translated: that is the bodhisattva path.

original: lam de la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: lam de la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Dwelling on that path, they complete all the perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having completed the perfections, they will attain the knowledge of all aspects in a single moment of wisdom.

original: de'i tshe de'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang mi skye bar spang bas yongs su spong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang mi skye bar spang bas yongs su spong bar 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, they will completely abandon all the afflictions that are connected to latent tendencies, by abandoning them without producing them again.

original: de sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par lta na /🔽dngos po med par yang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par lta na / dngos po med par yang mi dmigs na /
translated: At that time, when they look with the Buddha eye at the world systems in the trichiliocosm,🔽they will not apprehend even non-entities,

original: dngos po yod pa lta smos kyang mi smos //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa lta smos kyang mi smos //
translated: let alone entities.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya re drug pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya re drug pa //
translated: Volume 216

original: rab 'byor / @230a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / @230a *//
translated: Subhūti,

analyzed: de de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang mi rtog /

analyzed: mtshan mar mi byed do /

analyzed: mtshan mar mi byed de /

original: mtshan mar mi byed de /
analyzed: mtshan mar mi byed de /

original: snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po de la mi rtog /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po de la mi rtog /
translated: When practicing great compassion, they do not conceptualize great compassion,

original: mtshan mar mi byed de /
analyzed: mtshan mar mi byed de /
translated: nor do they make it into a sign.

original: dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do //
translated: They do not pay attention to it as an existent thing or a nonexistent thing.
